content: Legacy Video Overview for $5,000 + 1,000 Free SpinsLegacy Video Overview runs from April 6 till April 19. comments.author: examplens
comments.body: I don't think this is the best location for advertising this kind of campaign. Content creators (regardless, of video, text or something else) rarely come to the development section. this would probably belong most closely to the bounty section, but there, due to too much spam, your post will quickly become buried or less visible. I suggest that you offer rewards with payment in Bitcoin, so your post will be acceptable in the Services section, where you will achieve probably the best visibility.
